        <script><![CDATA[auditRemovalOfReleaseFromProduct();

function auditRemovalOfReleaseFromProduct(){
  if (!canDetachProductAndRelease(current.model, current.release)) {
    current.setAbortAction(true);
    gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Removal Vetoed: Release contains stories with this product"));
    debug("VETOED");
  } else
    debug("APPROVED");
}

function canDetachProductAndRelease(sysIdProduct, sysIdRelease) {
   var recStory = new GlideRecord("rm_story");
   recStory.addQuery("product", sysIdProduct);
   recStory.addQuery("release", sysIdRelease);   
   recStory.query();
   var hasStoriesInReleaseAndProduct = recStory.hasNext();
   return !hasStoriesInReleaseAndProduct;
 }

function debug(message){
  var debugme = false;
  if (debugme) {
    gs.log("################################");
    gs.log("### message = " + message);
    gs.log("### current = " + current);
    gs.log("### current.model = " + current.model);
    gs.log("### current.release = " + current.release);
    gs.log("########################################");
  }
}]]></script>
